review: works very well, keeps the popping to a bare minimum, easy to install, cleans in a flash, lightweight and works

this is the one that everyone told me I should use, being new to guitar I figured one polish (car) has to work well, that was very incorrect on my part, this is for the delicate woods and preserves them far better than ordinary polishes
great strings, deep rich tones from both highs and lows, a very good value for the dollar and customer service is second to none
works exactly like its ad says it would, eliminates pops and secondary noises in the background, easy to install, nice looking
provide a very good sound, minimal stretching past a couple of days of setting it, good lows and highs, good value
does really good with a fairly heavy microphone, adjustments stay in place without constantly tightening, works exactly as it should
being new to guitar this is just way too much fun, makes my playing acutally sound like I may know what I am doing, easy to setup and easy to use
nice wide lip, sturdy, appears to be well made and durable, nice finish on it, hopefully will last a long time
works great, appears to be well made, good connectors, twenty five foot allows a great deal of movement, good value
heavy duty, pretty sturdy, finish is not the best in the world but it certainly does the job it was intended for, holds secure and adjusts easily
light weight, easy to install, holds very well, does exactly what it was designed to do, hold a guitar on a wall

this case is perfect for storing a guitar in, I would not recommend using it for traveling anywhere unless in the back of your own vehicle, it will protect your guitar but it is not a heavy duty case, for the price this would be hard to beat by anyone
works great, small and easy to place to the side and out of the way, simple setup, plug it in, change the preference settings and it works
